Nightlight:
Nightlight arrived to the kitchen something was wrong, still she felt 
nervous and worried... But she didn't know why. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> Hazel smiles, watching Nightlight walk away.
> 
> Hazel: Be careful now, girl! You wouldn't want to fall and kill 
yourself.
> 
> Hazel goes into her room, slamming the door. Bronze does the same, 
as well as Cerulean. Periwinkle, Pink, White and Brown all go into 
one room and start arguing...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: airly2000@y... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Friday, November 16, 2001 3:21 PM
>   Subject: Re: Hazel
> 
> 
>   Nightlight:
> 
>   Nightlight arrived to the quarters "Well Hazel, here is the 
quarters 
>   sections, you and your friends can choose your quarters and rest, 
>   I'll care that no one annoy you; I'll prepare something to eat... 
>   Dinner will be soon."
> 
> 
>   Nightlight started to move towards other corritor, she tried to 
calm 
>   down, but the words that Aerotaur had told her was worrying her. 
>   Something was wrong, but what was?
> 
>
